episodes.title: The Dark History of The Catholic Church
episodes.description:
A lot of people find their meaning and vocation through a place like the Vatican but that being said there are some things that the Popes and Vatican City has done that are little less than morally good to say the least. So in today’s video I want to explore some of the darker side of the Catholic Church and cover some of the darker sides of their history. There is surprisingly a lot of darkness buried in their long history, a lot more than I was expecting but I’m going to focus on two areas I personally find the most abhorrent. The church's agreement with the Nazi & Facist goverment - Hitler and Mussolini and their approach towards the Holocaust. As well as child abuses and the concurring cover ups of said crimes over the years.

The catholic church has done both good and bad in this world.

What do you think?

Thanks for watching!

Please like, share & subscribe.

#catholicchurch #vthevatican #popefrancis

episodes.title: The Tragic Story of Heaven's Gate
episodes.description:
Possibly one of the biggest cult stories in America, Heavens gate convinced its members using a mix of Christian millenarianism new age and ufology with classic brainwashing and manipulation leading to the mass suicide of it’s members in 1997. 

Marshall H Applewhite, the founder believed Jesus was an extraterrestrial who came to Earth to teach humanity how to transcend their physical bodies. He saw himself as the reincarnation of Jesus, returning to complete the work of spiritual evolution and help believers ascend to the Next Level.

Throughout the 70's he recruited 100's of people with help from his friend Bonnie. He and Bonnie concluded they were the two endgame witnesses mentioned in Revelation 11. 

Unlike other cults there isn’t much documented physical or sexual abuse among its members but of course there was mental manipulation and control that can be classified as emotional and mental abuse which prevented members to use critical thinking and be easily controlled. 

In March 1997, police entered a mansion in Rancho Sante Fe in San Diego California, discovering the 39 victims of mass suicide, 21 women and 18 men. They were all found lying peaceably in matching dark clothes and Nike sneakers and had no noticeable signs of blood or trauma.

It’s a stark reminder to all of us weaponised religion with charismatic leaders and the power of belief can easily influence others.

Thanks for watching!

Please like, share and subscribe.

#heavensgate #cult #religion

It healed my depression and I hope it helps you too!

Thanks for Watching!

#pastor #frauds #religion

episodes.title: The Horrifying Abuse in The Children of God Cult
episodes.description:
In 1968 preacher David Brandt Berg founded a group called Teens for Christ which at first consisted of young runaways and hippies who were so called born again hippies. Over time the church would become the children of god  (now known as the Family International at its peak had 150,000 members around the world.) At the height of its popularity it had members such as River and Joaquin Phoenix, Rose McGowan and Jeremy Spencer who was a founding member of Fleetwood Mac that left the band in 1971 to join the cult. 

Berg promotes love and sex with children as young as 5 years of age and committed multiple abuses against his members especially the children.

In 1976 as an attempt to entice more members, he would use sex to show Gods love and mercy. As a result over 223,989 people were fished and over 10,000 babies were born through cult woman from 1971 to 2001 according to records from the cult and also hilariously enough caused a spread of herpes throughout the cult.  

Woman of the cult were forced to do this whether they wanted to or not.  It was so engrained in their doctrine to do so to spread gods love.

It was a vile a disgusting cult.

Thanks for watching.

Please like, share and subscribe.

#cult #childrenofgod #religion

episodes.title: The Richest Pastor in The World
episodes.description:
Americans know better than anyone what its like to sit down in-front of their TV set and see a pastor passionately tell them, the end is near, God is watching, homosexuality is a sin and more commonly and how imperative it is for them to donate money to their church. 

This phenomenon is known as Televangelism and this tool has been used in attempt to exploit and control since the 1970s. It allowed these pastors into the home of their faithful followers allowing them to reach audiences at unprecedented numbers. 

There are many examples of corrupt pastors who used this medium to extract as much money as possible from their followers. But to me, the most corrupt, disgusting and vile of them all is a man by the name of Kenneth Copeland.

Thanks for watching!

Please like, share and subscribe.

#KCN #pastor #kennethcopeland #christianity

episodes.title: The Curse of Scientology
episodes.description:
Scientology has to be one of the most talked about cult like religions in the world. I would find it hard to believe that their are many people who have not heard of a religion that has one of the biggest celebrities in the world connected to it - Tom Cruise.

Scientology is infamous for harassing ex members and pretty much anyone who openly critiques them.  They use psychological warfare to control their members, gaslighting them and manipulating every aspect of their lives. They have vast tax free wealth, in which they use to buy property all over the world. Some would say their power and influence could match that of the Catholic Church.

Thanks for watching.

episodes.title: Jim Jones & The Jonestown Massacre
episodes.description:
In this video I wanted to focus on Jim Jones, an American who created the The Peoples Temple which would lead to the deaths of over 900 Americans.  

Jones instilled fear in his followers through various means, including public humiliations, threats of violence, and staged loyalty tests. Members were made to believe that terrible consequences awaited them if they disobeyed or left the group.

This would lead to the horrible mass murder of over 900 people in one of the biggest civilian causulties in American history.

Thanks for watching.

Please like, share and subscribe.

#jimjones #peoplestemple #jonestownmassacure

episodes.title: The Dark Truth of Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description:
When I think of Jehovah's Witnesses I imagine my door bell ringing and someone asking me if I have accepted  Jesus Into my life. They love to share the word of God and the bible with anyone willing to listen.  They also don’t agree with blood transfusions but Jehovah's Witnesses do not reject transfusion of whole autologous blood so long as it is not stored prior to surgery, are anti abortion, anti gay marriage and see mental health issues as weakness in spirituality. There is sexual abuse cover, shunning of old members, and a hierarchy you dont question and must follow.

So who is Jehovah? And what did their followers witness? 

Thanks for watching.

Please like share and subscribe.

#jehovahswitness #jehovah #jesus

episodes.title: QAnon | America’s Strangest Conspiracy Theory
episodes.description:
QAnon is a far-right conspiracy theory that originated on internet message boards in October 2017. It centres around an anonymous individual known as "Q" who claims to have insider knowledge of a secret global conspiracy involving high-ranking officials and politicians, which they refer to as the "deep state" or "cabal". QAnon followers believe that this conspiracy is working to undermine and overthrow the U.S. government, and that Donald Trump is secretly working to expose and defeat it.

The conspiracy theory is based on a series of cryptic messages posted by "Q" on internet message boards, which followers interpret as clues to unraveling the supposed conspiracy. QAnon has been linked to several real-world incidents, including the storming of the U.S. Capitol on January 6, 2021, and has been classified by the FBI as a domestic terrorist threat.
It's important to note that QAnon is not based on any credible evidence or facts, and has been widely debunked by experts and fact-checkers. It promotes dangerous and false information, and can lead to real-world harm.

Thanks for watching.

Please like, share and subscribe!
#conspiracy #trump #documentary #critique
